flow.descriptionCdata:
b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.01489d54-dc78-4a0c-ba37-2dac46a3b709.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.0aac8a85-ca0a-47d6-ae20-43d47c8b9cd5.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.0d828dea-aacb-4cef-8b1c-287693053560.prompt=Resource Provider ID b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.12da3f86-a298-41d9-a8da-7cdb10e325ea.prompt=User Identifier b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.17764c31-e2d0-476c-b3ea-fd6facfad8cb.prompt=Artifact ID b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.2ce2213c-053e-4abe-a634-286b5e70e7b8.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.4084e24b-53c0-45a2-bc5e-9d1b2439101a.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.49ceca00-6aec-4e8a-bbcc-f62fce8a16cc.prompt=Process Instance ID b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.623b030a-0575-41b6-9053-4e3604e6c209.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.716dcb23-2b9e-43ed-bbe8-703e8df41707.prompt=User Identifier b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.7a7d3433-6d1a-4f44-9f1b-73b3335de6f2.prompt=User Identifier b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.80b0c5de-d728-4b26-8be3-b25b5906f966.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.8d13c7a3-1b5c-42fd-9757-55cff6e67699.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.98229c5d-f9d8-458e-adb4-6d4025ce9f11.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.aa0bd92a-2685-4b4c-bea5-92becf580cd3.prompt=Process Instance ID b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.description=
Rolls back the VM deployment by cleaning up the vCenter resources.

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.ee40b277-c495-4480-bfcc-a36b6eca572e.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ b2d20a72-ff02-4b99-a084-d1b4df439709.ffc53026-eeb2-40a3-b856-cb2562a121a8.prompt=User Identifier
flow.name: vCenter Simple Compute - Failure Handling

staticBinding.value: Failed to delete the Virtual machine. Manual clean up migh be required
Failed to get the user Identifier. Verify the configurations. Manual clean up of VM might be required.
Failed to get the provider details. Manual clean up might be required.
Failed to get the VM details. Manual clean up might be required.
